    • checkForValidUserName

      public static String checkForValidUserName(String input)
      This method is a mechanical transformation of a Finite State Machine diagram into a Java method.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string for the Finite State Machine
      Returns:
      An output string that is empty if every things is okay or it is a String with a helpful description of the error
